After suddenly receiving a diagnosis for a terminal brain tumor, she becomes determined to live out one ambitious last dream before she dies - to \"discover a flower that has yet to be found in the world.\" In pursuit of this dream, she heads off to Gurvansaikhan. But her medical diagnosis ends up being false, and Haewon, completely oblivious, continues her journey until she collapses from a severe flu.  \n  \nWhen she comes to in an unfamiliar ger (a traditional nomadic house in Mongolia), she's greeted by a completely handsome stranger, Eunsung! Exhausted by the conflict over who would inherit his father's company, Eunsung is determined to live his own life, escaping far away to the Mongolian plains with just his dog, Roy.   \n  \nTwo people who find each other in the midst of a vast plain… Can both of them fulfill their own dreams in this unfamiliar, barren, foreign land? Take this money and leave immediately!\"\n\n\"Yes! Goodbye!\"\n\nShe became the incompetent villainess who commits wrongdoings in order to earn the love of her fiancé, the male lead. Her reputation was already at rock bottom and the main characters, who can't live without each other, are having an affair.\n\n\"Getting kicked out and receiving money is good enough!\"\n\nSo after she was kicked out, she set up a stationery store in front of a school. She reminisces of snacks, beer candy, and even bubbles! Just you wait, kids! But… somehow her young customers are a little weird?\n\n\"I'll find you a handsome and modest man, and not someone who has an affair like my brother!\"\n\n\"Ha, then what about my brother, the crown prince?”\n\n\"…the tower master is the best.\"\n\nThe great magic swordsman, the crown prince, the villainous tower master, and finally, the hidden villain. The stationery store, which she thought would be peaceful, left her with no rest.\n\n*Help me! I just wanted to live a normal life!*\n\n---\nWhat's a girl to do when she wakes up in the body of a villainess? Meldenique Babelloa is a supporting character in a romance novel starring her fiancé, Duke Lennox Hessman, and… her sister, Sheria! Heartbroken, she eventually dies a tragic death as a villainess… or so the original story goes. Determined not to follow the script, Meldenique resolutely abandons her old life and sets out to open… a stationery shop! Will she succeed in defying fate and building the stationery shop of her dreams?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/55148613)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B8%EA%B5%AC%EC%A0%90%EC%97%90-%EC%98%A4%EC%A7%80-%EB%A7%88%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94/2873), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/59047014)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainesss-stationery-shop/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26274\u0026contentId=274)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%AB%8B%E5%8B%BF%E9%80%B2%E5%85%A5%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%96%87%E5%85%B7%E5%BA%97/338)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/898)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Jangan-Kunjungi-Toko-Alat-Tulis-Wanita-Jahat/285)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103612)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/396)","fr":"«Une chose inutile comme toi n’a aucune valeur dans notre famille. Prends cet argent et pars immédiatement!»\n\n«Oui! Au revoir!»\n\nElle est devenue la méchante incompétente qui commet des actes répréhensibles afin de gagner l’amour de son fiancé, le protagoniste. Sa réputation était déjà au plus bas et les personnages principaux, qui ne peuvent pas vivre l’un sans l’autre, ont une liaison.\n\n«Se faire virer et recevoir de l’argent, c’est déjà bien!»\n\nAinsi, après avoir été mise à la porte, elle a ouvert une papeterie devant une école. Elle se souvient des snacks, des bonbons à la bière, et même des bulles ! Attendez, les enfants ! Mais… ses jeunes clients sont un peu bizarres?\n\n«Je te trouverai un homme beau et modeste, et pas quelqu’un qui a une liaison comme mon frère!»\n\n«Ha, alors qu’en est-il de mon frère, le prince héritier?»\n\n«…le maître de la tour est le meilleur.»\n\nLe grand épéiste magique, le prince héritier, le méchant maître de la tour, et enfin, le méchant caché. La papeterie, qu’elle pensait être paisible, ne lui laissait aucun répit. Aidez-moi! Je voulais juste vivre une vie normale!\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/55148613)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B8%EA%B5%AC%EC%A0%90%EC%97%90-%EC%98%A4%EC%A7%80-%EB%A7%88%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94/2873), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/59047014)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainesss-stationery-shop/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26274\u0026contentId=274)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%AB%8B%E5%8B%BF%E9%80%B2%E5%85%A5%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%96%87%E5%85%B7%E5%BA%97/338)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/898)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Jangan-Kunjungi-Toko-Alat-Tulis-Wanita-Jahat/285)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103612)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/396)","ko":"남주의 약혼녀이지만, 그의 사랑을 받기 위해 악행을 저지르는 무능한 악녀에 빙의했다. \n이미 평판은 밑바닥이고, 서로 죽고 못 사는 주인공들은 저들끼리 불륜까지 막 저지르는 막장 상황. \n\n\"너 같이 쓸모 없는 것은 우리 가문에 있을 가치가 없다. 이 돈을 받고 썩 꺼지거라!\"\n\"네! 안녕히 계세요!\" \n\n그래서 냉큼 돈 받고 쫓겨나 학교 앞에 추억의 문구점을 차렸다. \n추억의 쫀드기, 맥주사탕, 비눗방울 놀이까지! 어린이들 기다려! \n\n그런데.... 어쩐지 내 어린 고객님들이 좀 이상하다? \n\n\"내가, 우리 오빠 같은 불륜남 말고 잘생기고 조신한 남자 찾아 줄게요!\"\n\"헉, 그럼 황태자이신 우리 형님은 어때?\" \n\"....마탑주님이 최고야.\" \n\n그렇게 위대한 마검, 차기 황태자, 악역인 마탑주, 그리고 최종 흑막까지 엮이게 되면서 \n평화로울 줄만 알았던 문구점에는 하루도 바람 잘 날이 없는데. \n\n살려줘! 난 그냥 평범하게 살고 싶었을 뿐이라고!\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/55148613)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B8%EA%B5%AC%EC%A0%90%EC%97%90-%EC%98%A4%EC%A7%80-%EB%A7%88%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94/2873), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/59047014)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainesss-stationery-shop/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26274\u0026contentId=274)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%AB%8B%E5%8B%BF%E9%80%B2%E5%85%A5%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%96%87%E5%85%B7%E5%BA%97/338)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/898)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Jangan-Kunjungi-Toko-Alat-Tulis-Wanita-Jahat/285)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103612)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/396)","pt":"O que uma garota deve fazer quando acorda no corpo de uma vilã? Determinada a não seguir o roteiro, Meldenique abandona resolutamente sua antiga vida e se propõe a abrir... uma papelaria! Прощай!\"\nОна стала некомпетентной злодейкой, которая совершает проступки, чтобы заслужить любовь своего жениха, главного героя.\nЕё репутация уже была на дне, и главные герои, которые не могут жить друг без друга, заводят роман.\n\" Быть выгнанным и получать деньги - это хорошо!\"\nПоэтому после того, как её выгнали, она открыла магазин канцелярских товаров перед школой. Она продаёт закуски, пивные конфеты и даже пузыри! Погодите, детки!\nНо… почему-то её молодые клиенты немного странные?\n\"Я найду тебе красивого и скромного мужчину, а не такого , у которого есть роман, как у моего брата!\"\n\"Ха, а что насчет моего брата, крон-принца?\"\n\"… мастер башни - лучший. *\nВеликий магический фехтовальщик, следующий кронпринц, злодейский хозяин башни и, наконец, скрытый злодей.\nМагазин канцелярских товаров, который, как она думала, будет мирным, не оставлял ей покоя.\nПомогите мне! Забирай ці гроші та вали звідси!\n-Чудово! Бувай!\n\nВона прийшла до тями ні на що не здатною злодійкою, яка творила зло, щоб завоювати любов її нареченого, головного героя.\n\nЇї репутація і так була на дні, а головні герої, які не можуть жити один без одного, закрутили роман.\n-Мене хоч і виперли, але дали гроші - вже непогано!\n\nПісля того, як її вигнали з дому, вона відкрила перший магазин канцелярських товарів перед школою. Крім іншого, там продаються закуски, солодощі та навіть жуйка! Ну, дітлахи, тримайтеся!\nАле... Чому її юні клієнти такі дивні?\n\n-Я знайду тобі гарного і скромного хлопця, а не дурня, що ходить ліворуч, як мій брат!\n-Ха, а як щодо мого брата, наслідного принца?\n—Господар Башти просто найкращий.\n\nВеликий магічний воїн, королівський принц, жахливий власник вежі та таємничий лиходій.\n\nМирне життя, яке вона хотіла від магазину канцелярії, обернулася зовсім інакше.\nДопоможіть! Я просто хотіла жити нормальним життям!\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/55148613)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B8%EA%B5%AC%EC%A0%90%EC%97%90-%EC%98%A4%EC%A7%80-%EB%A7%88%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94/2873), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/59047014)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainesss-stationery-shop/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26274\u0026contentId=274)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%AB%8B%E5%8B%BF%E9%80%B2%E5%85%A5%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%96%87%E5%85%B7%E5%BA%97/338)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/898)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Jangan-Kunjungi-Toko-Alat-Tulis-Wanita-Jahat/285)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103612)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/396)","vi":"“Một thứ vô dụng như mày không xứng đáng ở trong gia đình này. Cầm lấy số tiền này và cút đi!” “Được rồi! Tạm biệt!” Cô trở thành một nhân vật phản diện bất tài, thực hiện những hành vi sai trái để giành được tình yêu của vị hôn phu của mình, nam chính. Danh tiếng của cô đã xuống đáy và các nhân vật chính, những người vốn không thể sống thiếu nhau, đang có quan hệ tình cảm với nhau. “Bị đuổi ra ngoài mà được nhận tiền là quá tốt rồi!” Vì vậy, sau khi cô ấy bị đuổi ra khỏi nhà, cô ấy đã mở một cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm ở phía trước của một trường học. Cô ấy hồi tưởng lại về đồ ăn nhẹ, kẹo bia, và thậm chí cả chơi với bong bóng xà phòng! Các em chỉ cần chờ thôi, mấy nhóc à! Nhưng… Không hiểu sao những khách hàng trẻ tuổi của cô lại có chút kỳ lạ? “Em sẽ tìm cho chị một chàng trai đẹp mã và khiêm tốn, và cả chưa từng yêu ai như anh trai em chẳng hạn!” “Ha, vậy còn anh trai em, hoàng thái tử thì sao?” “… Chủ tháp là tuyệt nhất. ” Kiếm sĩ ma thuật vĩ đại, tiếp đó là hoàng thái tử, chủ nhân của tòa tháp tàn độc và cuối cùng là nhân vật phản diện giấu mặt. Cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm mà cô tưởng chừng sẽ yên bình lại khiến cô không nghỉ ngơi được.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/55148613)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** “是！再見！” 所以立刻拿了錢被趕出去，在學校門前開了一家記憶中的文具店。\n\n回憶中的橡皮糖，啤酒糖，再到吹肥皂泡泡！小孩子們等著吧！但是... 我的小客人怎麼有點兒奇怪？\n\n“我，不要我哥哥那樣的出軌男，給你找長得帥的正經男人！” “嗬，那麼我哥哥皇太子怎麼樣？” “.…魔法塔主是最棒的。”\n\n就那樣偉大的魔劍，下一任皇太子，反派魔法塔主，還被牽扯到最終的黑幕之中，本以為很平和的文具店沒有一天風平浪靜。\n\n救救我！我只是想過平凡的生活！\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/55148613)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** The team must work together to finish the job and earn their large payday, all while keeping ahead of the Executioners from the Kansai Police on their tail. Because he values her as a real-life gamer friend, he tries not to look at her as someone of the opposite gender.\n\nOne day however, Mari wore a miniskirt with kneesocks. Sakamoto, a lover of miniskirts and kneesocks, couldn't help but pay attention to Mari's lower half. As the game session heats up, Mari lets her guard down, allowing him to see plenty of panty shots.\n\nCan Sakamoto resist his lust for his friend? The term was coined by Tezuka to mean \"Animation \u0026 Drama,\" \"Animation \u0026 Cinerama,\" and \"Animation \u0026 Panorama,\" and the following three films are often referred to as the \"Animerama Trilogy.\n- One Thousand and One Nights\n- Cleopatra\n- Belladonna of Sadness\n\nAll were billed as \"anime for adults\" at the time of their release.\n\nIn addition, at the time of publication, the front of this volume contains a blurb by Osamu Tezuka, which reads as follows:\n\n*By taking out gags that could only be shown in the film, and detailing the context behind the characters and the period,\nI tried to have it be a work anyone can enjoy - those who have and haven't seen the film.*\n\nDon't miss this rare opportunity!"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/%E6%89%8B%E5%A1%9A-%E6%B2%BB%E8%99%AB/dp/4835456467/ref=sr_1_1?crid=2MJ7FTQL4T7QR\u0026keywords=%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AC%E3%82%AA%E3%83%91%E3%83%88%E3%83%A9%3C%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E7%89%88%3E\u0026qid=1648590870\u0026sprefix=%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AC%E3%82%AA%E3%83%91%E3%83%88%E3%83%A9+%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E7%89%88+%2Caps%2C237\u0026sr=8-1","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2312072?s_ssid=e3f5d62437fb46add"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"c8cbe35b-1b2b-4a3f-9c37-db84c4514856","name":{"en":"Medical"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

9044f2b2-e6af-4941-ad7c-138049c8f0b0:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9044f2b2-e6af-4941-ad7c-138049c8f0b0","title":{"en":"Adventure Gaboten Island"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Bouken Gabotenjima"},{"ja":"冒険ガボテン島"},{"ja-ro":"Bouken Gaboten Shima"}],"description":{"en":"Igao, who has a strong sense of elitism, secretly has a burning rivalry with Ryuta, who is stubborn but has the drive to take action. Tomato is Ryuta's younger sister who takes care of all the household chores, Kyuri is a scholar type, and Gabo is gluttonous and strong. In addition, the mynah bird Kero and Gori, who looks exactly like Gabo, join the group, and the painful yet fun adventures of Gaboten Island continue. Comment from the publisher \"Adventure Gaboten Island'' is based on the masterpiece \"Fifteen Boys Drifting Chronicles''. A moving story about five boys and girls presented by Fumio Hisamatsu. TBS, which made the authentic science fiction anime \"Super Jetter'' a hit, subsequently planned Japan's first survival anime as a program. \"Adventure Gaboten Island'' aired in 1967, depicting the activities of young boys who bravely survive on a deserted island in the South Sea, and was received with overwhelming sympathy from viewers at the time. The manga version (serialized in Weekly Shonen Sunday at the same time as the broadcast) by Fumio Hisamatsu, one of the original authors of the same work, was just as entertaining as the anime. About the author Fumio Hisamatsu (Fumio Hisamatsu) appeared like a comet in his early twenties and was responsible for the settings and original illustrations for TBS's signature anime \"Fujimaru of the Wind,'' \"Super Jetter,'' and \"Adventure Gaboten Island.'' At the same time, as a manga artist, he serializes the above works in real time (Fujimaru = We, Super Jetter \u0026 Gaboten Island = Shonen Sunday). At that time, he was working in the studio during the day to draw original animations, and at night he drew serialized manga."},"links":{"mu":"rmvt573"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}}]}

Inspired by the unique sound of Japanese electronic-swing rap, HonkyTonk Hustlers tells the story of two men from completely different worlds, taking on the big city and it's music market in the midst of the Great Prohibition of Rap Music in the 1920's era. Set in an alternate universe, the history of our world is irrelevant- however, the musical history of the past manifests itself in it's own ways  \n  \nJin, a hard-working country boy born to overseas immigrants, has known nothing but honesty and dedication his entire life. An energetic girl named Manami Amamiya transfers to a new school where she quickly becomes the student council president and starts to bring back some vigor in the students lives.  \n  \nGakuen Utopia Manabi Straight! is a Japanese multimedia project co-developed by ufotable and MediaWorks. It originally began as a reader-participation game with its development directly influenced by readers, launching in volume 12 of MediaWorks' Dengeki AniMaga magazine in August 2004. It continued until volume 19 in August 2005, at which time the magazine ceased publication. A manga adaptation with story by ufotable and illustrated by Tartan Check was serialized in MediaWorks' Dengeki Daioh magazine between December 2005 and February 2008. Four tankōbon volumes were released between May 2006 and February 2008. A 12-episode anime produced by ufotable aired between January and March 2007, with an OVA in October of that year."},"links":{"al":"34168","ap":"manabi-straight","kt":"9121","mal":"4168","mu":"6412"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}
